title: Can Acupuncture Help Boost My Immunity? - Sharecare
description: Acupuncture can boost immunity because certain points on the body have a regulating effect on an overactive immune system, making you less susceptible to allergens. Watch acupuncturist Jill Blakeway explain how acupuncture works to boost immunity.
cleaned_text: Can Acupuncture Help Boost My Immunity?
